remarks: The composition of two translations is a translation.  Part of proof of Lemma G of [Crawley] p. 116, line 15 on p. 117.  (Contributed by NM, 31-May-2013.)
statement:
ltrnco.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
ltrnco.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
ltrnco $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ F e. T /\ G e. T ) -> ( F o. G ) e. T ) $.
